comments:
When a user has no ~/.rpmmacros, an exception is thrown:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/fedora/.rpmmacros (No such file or directory)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
...
at org.eclipse.linuxtools.rpm.ui.editor.RpmMacroProposalsList.addMacroToMap(RpmMacroProposalsList.java:72)

(This bug was originally created as a clone of Red Hat bug #326331.)
